Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $29.99 - $20.38
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:18:55 UTC – Details)


Take a trip down memory lane with this retro 1989 edition of the fun family-favorite, the Aggravation Game! It’s The classic marble race game where 2 to 6 players compete. Opponents race around the board from base to home, disrupting each other’s marbles in the quest to be first. A shortcut might be helpful, but be careful! It just might set you back instead. The first player to move their marbles around the board to home wins. Remember, “aggravating” other players in this game is encouraged and super fun! Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
Retro edition inspired by the 1989 game
Suspenseful and exciting gameplay
Players compete to get all their marbles back home first
Classic, family-fun game
Includes gameboard, 6 dice, and 24 marbles

5

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;

onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,

onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

);

Price: $14.95 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:13:47 UTC – Details)


Rack-o was originally released in 1956, and since then families have enjoyed this Rack’Em & score fun-filled card game. This new addition, featuring fine quality cards with bold numbers, will delight players young and old. Rack-o is timeless fun. Players randomly slot 10 cards on their rack. The race then begins to draw and discard until one player positions 10 cards in numerical sequence from low to high. Sound simple? it is – but you will need skillful play, concentration and just a little luck to win. We include a deck of (60) playing cards, (4) plastic rack-o racks and instructions. Recommended for ages 8+, 2-4 players.
A FUN FILLED CARD GAME: “Rack-O” was originally released in 1956. This new retro edition, featuring fine quality cards with bold numbers, will delight players young and old.
THE PLAY: Each player is dealt 10 cards. Place cards in your rack in order, slot 50 down to 5. Turn over top card from the stockpile. Continue taking cards in turn, exchanging for cards in your rack.
WINNING A ROUND: To go “Rack-O”, player must have all ten cards in his rack from a low card in the #5 slot to a high card in the #50 slot.
SCORING: the player who goes “Rack-O” first, scores 75 points. 5 points for each of the 10 cards in his rack, and 25 points for going Rack-O.
CONTENTS: (1) 60 card deck of Rack-O cards, (4) plastic rack-o racks, instructions. For 2-4 players. Recommended ages 8+


Winning Moves RACK-O, Retro package Card Game

Players randomly slot ten cards on their rack. The race then begins to draw and discard until one player positions ten cards in numerical sequence. Sound simple? It is but you will need skillful play, concentration and just a little luck to win.

– Ages: 8 and up.

– Players: 2 to 4.

Date First Available May 24, 2019

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $42.99 - $38.89
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:06:15 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Letton focus on R&D and manufacturing wireless keyboard and mouse combo.

Our products have brilliant designs and satisfy the ultimate performance demand from customers and professional eSports teams. In order to manufacture the products with professional-grade quality and durability, we pay a lot of attention to the selection of materials, design of the surface and development of hardware.

WIRELESS KEYBOARD MOUSE COMBO

COLOR WIRELESS KEYBOARD MOUSE

【Pink Wireless Keyboard Mouse Set】 Includes Cute Wireless Pink Keyboard with Round Retro Style Key and Wireless Optical Mice. ALL-IN-ONE PC GAMER VALUE KIT. ATTENTION: The CONNECTOR FOR THE PC IS ON THE BACK OF THE MICE.
【Full-Size keyboard with Cute Round Keys】The computer keyboards with mouse has pink retro round keys and the silent click of the quiet mice will allow you to do your job without disturbing others. The mini Optical mouse is with modern ergonomic design, DPI adjustable(800-1200-1600).
【Detachable Round Keycaps & Floating Button Design】All circle buttons can be disassembled, put in water to clean, and also equipped with a brush to clean the dust on the aethestic keyboard.
【2.4GHz Wireless Dropout-Free Connection】2.4GHz signal delivers up to a range of 28 feet connection that allows you to work with your PC from a distance. One small Nano receiver (USB 2.0) connects both the mouse and keyboard,high speed rate of return allows the combo to ensure their stable and smooth transmission without delay and frame skip, hence to enhance your typing experience.
【Durability Battery Life】Both keyboard and mouse wireless turn into Power-save mode automatically, click any key or button to wake-up within seconds. Each of them runs on one AA battery (Included). Low battery indication shows in the top right corner, when the battery is dying,the keyboard’s low battery indication light will remind you to replace the battery.
【Wide Compatible】The pink wireless keyboard and mouse compatible with operating systems(USB 2.0 port)—Windows or Mac OS, Work perfectly with Mac, Destop, PC, Laptop and more.
【1 Year Warranty】The cute mouse and keyboard set with graceful gift package, you can used it by yourself or as a gift to friends, lovers, children, etc. This full-Sized round keyboards mouse comes with one year warranty, if you encounter any problems please contact us through Amazon email, we will provide you with satisfactory solutions.

Letton V2020 Advanced 2.4 GHz Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combos delivers a fast, reliable, secure connection using 128-bit AES keyboard encryption with virtually no delays or dropouts—even in busy wireless environments.

Read more

Letton focus on R&D and manufacturing wireless keyboard and mouse combo.

Our products have brilliant designs and satisfy the ultimate performance demand from customers and professional eSports teams. In order to manufacture the products with professional-grade quality and durability, we pay a lot of attention to the selection of materials, design of the surface and development of hardware.

Full-size Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo with Numeric Keypad

Plug & Play, One Nano Receiver Connect Both Keyboard and Mouse

This series of wireless keyboard mouse combo is made of plastic characterized by ergonomic design and comfortable feel. The round buttons design combine the inspiration of vintage typewriters with research and development by the size of the contact area between fingers and keycaps, which provide a more comfortable typing experience.

Keyboard weight: 718+5g

Mouse weight: 75+5g

Keyboard size: 17.7*5.47*1.37 in

Mouse size: 4*2.44*1.2 in

  • Package Contents:
  • 1x Full-size Wireless keyboard
  • 1xWireless mouse
  • 1xNano receiver(On the back of the keyboard)
  • 1xUser manual
  • 2xAA Batteries

Read more

Plug & Play Wireless Receiver

No drive needed, Simply plug the included wireless receiver into your computer’s USB port, it install automatically. Both wireless keyboard and mouse will be connected in the same time,and start using your keyboard and mouse without software to install.

MOUSE with Adjustable DPI

The mouse offers 3 adjustable DPI levels(800-1200-1600) for you to adjust the sensitivity of the mouse to meet your different requirements.

Wide Compatible

The wirelss combo support operatingsystems with USB2.0 port,such as Windows 2000，XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10，Mac OS, Smart TV and more. (Note: Hotkeys function may not fully compatible with Mac, OS System)

Read more

Feel-good Typing

This wireless combo cradles your hands in comfort to help minimize hand and wrist strain,even after spending all day at your computer.

Keyboard Shortcuts

Save time with eight keyboard hot keys. Full-size keyboard provide instant access to most-used applications like email, Internet and volume up/down.

FN+ESC : Music Player FN+F1 : Player/ Pause FN+F2 : Previous One FN+F3 : Next One FN+F4 : Volume+ FN+F5 : Volume- FN+F6 : Mute FN+F7 : Web FN+F8 : Search FN+F9 : Favorites FN+F10 : Email FN+F11 : Lock FN+F12 : Windows

Install Instructions

  1. Open the battery case, insert the battery to the case of keyboard and mice, One AA battery for the mouse, One AA battery for the keyboard( battery included).
  2. Cover the battery case and remove the receiver.
  3. Insert the receiver into the computer USB interface, wait a minute and you can use this combo immediately.

Read more

4.5
Price: $42.99 - $38.89
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:06:15 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.98
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:01:12 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Purifying the air and good for health

XXXFLOWER is committed to the design and production of DIY decorations for garden, home, office, kitchen and bathroom. The design style is retro and charming, adding a simple and classic feel to your living space.

Perfect Combination

Natural wood has a unique textures, light but firm, high transparent borosilicate glass is smooth without scratches,allowing you to observe the growth of plants more clearly. Great for growing houseplants and can purify indoor air and good for health

More Stable Design

The metal swivel holder passes through the glass bulb, which is convenient to change the water and not easy to knock over.Propagates your plant’s babies in style, slim glass container provides plenty of room for plant’s roots and all are visible for observing its growth condition.

Best Patio Decoration

Hydroponic plant propagator can beautify and purify your room and office, it will create fresh green atmosphere and make you feel relaxed.The cute plant terrarium propagator with high-quality is great for flower arrangement, window sill, office decoration.

Super Stability and Smooth

High-quality mosaic structure, beautiful, smooth and not rough, thickened glass, no easy to break

Planter Tips

Retro wooden plant propagation station glass for Desktop , perfect for growing plants houseplants, for example water plants or fern.

You can use your imagination to your heart’s content with the plants you like.

For example:

Green dillGeraniumMintVine plantBaby’s breathRoseTulip

Best Gift for Plant lover

Best gifts for women plant lovers – Mother’s Day, birthday, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving gift ideas. Nice present to your nature-loving, gardeners. Sweet wedding party, anniversary, and special occasions decoration gifts. Make a great gift for the plant-lover in your life.

Size
4.92″H x 8.66″W x 1.57″D 27.9″H x 7.9″ W x 2.0″ D 7.9″H x 3.9″ W x 2.8″ D 37.8″H x 14.0″ W x 2.0″ D 180 ml/ 6 oz 5.5″H x 15″ W x 4″ D

Material
Wood, Glass Wood, Glass Wood, Glass Wood, Glass Glass Wood, Glass

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.77 x 5.75 x 3.5 inches; 1.15 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 14, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HUABEI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07D29P5Z1

✿ Perfect combination of natural wood and clear glass- Frame is made of sturdy and robust nature wood, 3 bulb terrariums are made of High boron silicon heat resistant glass. (thick and durable to withstand the pass of time). Elevate your home office décor and bring a touch of freshness and elegance to your house & office
✿Retro Home Office Décor: Great for floral arrangement, cutting plants, artificial, freshly flowers, mixed bouquets, water rooted plants or live houseplants, likes Scindapsus, Pothos vine, African violets, Lucky Bamboo, even for Herbs, you can observe its growth condition and help your plants thrive, perfect for your home windowsill, office desk, living room table, bedroom, nursery or kitchen
✿ Best gifts for women plant lovers – Mother’s Day, birthday, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving gift ideas. Nice present to your nature-loving, gardeners. Sweet wedding party, anniversary, and special occasions decoration gifts.
